words.def: clothing of a distinctive style or for a particular occasion
a mechanical device for gripping an object
light informal conversation for social occasions
a flexible container with a single opening
One who engages in arbitrage, an arbitrageur.
a room or establishment where alcoholic drinks are served over a counter
an undergarment worn by women to support their breasts
primitive predaceous North American fish covered with hard scales and having long jaws with needlelike teeth
a small piece of cloth or paper
a soft silvery metallic element of the alkali earth group
a colorless and odorless inert gas
